title: Google\Cloud\Trace\Sampler\RandomSampler
name: RandomSampler
description: This implementation of the SamplerInterface uses a pseudo-random number generator to sample a percentage of requests.

params.name: percentage
params.description: The percentage of requests to sample. Must be between 0 and 1.

methods.name: shouldSample
methods.description: Uses a pseudo-random number generator to decide if we should sample the request.

methods.name: rate
methods.description: Return the percentage of requests to sample represented as a float between 0 and 1
